text: Mandinga Airport is an airport serving the platinum mining town of Condoto in the Chocó Department of Colombia. The airport is southwest of the town. The Condoto non-directional beacon (Ident: CDT) is located on the field.Condoto NDB ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Mandinga *OurAirports - Mandinga *SkyVector - Mandinga *FallingRain - Mandinga Airport * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Mandinga Airport
